title: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Plus Size Kaia Side Button Skimmer Short
features: STYLE - Midrise short sits below natural waist with standard size pockets, front zip and belt loops on a below the knee length taper fit
VERSATILITY - Goes great with all tops from trendy to basic tee shirts and all footwear from wedges to your favorite flats, ideal travel attire
LENGTH - This mid waist long length short is 17 inches from crotch to hem with a 16.5 inch leg opening at bottom
Gloria Vanderbilt - Effortlessly fun and stylish, versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages
description: Gloria Vanderbilt Women Apparel - Kaia midrise waist skimmer short sits just below your natural waistline with four functional standard size pockets to fit most of your must have items (ex: keys, wallets and most cell phones). This long length short goes great with any top and footwear combination, so it is easy to wear to work, attending a class and all out door activity from BBQ's to hikes with friends. Ideal light weight travel attire, available in assorted colors and washes. - Gloria Vanderbilt Brand; Effortlessly fun and stylish, versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
